Title: Validate UDM Segment Mapping for Valid Parallel Rating
Description: Ensure UDM segment and subsegment are correctly derived when all conditions are met.
Test Steps: Load data with ingest_date < cutoff_date; Ensure last ii_rat_segment = 'BNK'; Ensure udm_segment ≠ 'PER' or 'SCO'; Ensure ii_rat_segment is null for current ingest_date; Run ETL job.
Expected Results: UDM segment = 'BNK'; UDM subsegment = last ii_rat_subsegment.

Title: Validate Multiple Segment Types (FIN, FUN, RE, SHI, TOA)
Description: Validate logic across all allowed segment types.
Test Steps: Repeat TC_UDM_001 for each segment type; Validate mapping logic.
Expected Results: UDM segment and subsegment match last ii_rat_segment and subsegment respectively.

Title: Reject Mapping When ii_rat_segment Is Present in Current Ingest
Description: Ensure logic does not apply if ii_rat_segment is not null in current ingest_date.
Test Steps: Load data with ii_rat_segment = 'BNK' in current ingest_date; Run ETL job.

Title: Reject Mapping for Excluded UDM Segments
Description: Ensure mapping is skipped when udm_segment is 'PER' or 'SCO'.
Test Steps: Load data with udm_segment = 'PER'; Run ETL job.

Title: Validate Legacy Model Segment Mapping Remains Unchanged
Description: Ensure existing model outbound logic is unaffected.
Test Steps: Run ETL with legacy model segment data; Validate model outbound table.
Expected Results: Model segment mapping remains consistent with pre-change logic.

Title: Validate Freeze and Override Precedence
Description: Ensure parallel rating logic is applied after freeze and override logic.
Test Steps: Load data with freeze and override flags; Run ETL job.
Expected Results: Freeze and override logic applied first; parallel rating logic applied afterward.

Title: Validate Data Lineage from Source to UDM
Description: Ensure traceability of segment mapping from source tables to UDM.
Test Steps: Load source data with valid ii_rat_segment history; Run ETL job; Trace lineage from source to UDM.
Expected Results: Lineage clearly shows mapping from last ii_rat_segment to UDM segment.

Title: Audit Trail Validation for Segment Overrides
Description: Ensure audit trail captures override logic application.
Test Steps: Enable audit logging; Run ETL job with override scenario; Review audit logs.
Expected Results: Audit logs show override applied post-freeze, with segment source and timestamp.
